entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 11:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
